title: Mobile Microlearning Design for Nursing History Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and understanding of secondary education standards
context.additional_context: Asynchronous and Synchronous Activities Using Virtual Learning Objects Based on the ADDIE Model. Applied in an LMS Environment Similar to Moodle

learning_goals: Learners will be able to chronologically explain key figures and events in the development of modern nursing.
Learners will be able to analyze the impact of historical changes in nursing theories on contemporary clinical practice.
Learners will be able to autonomously explore and evaluate nursing history-related materials using digital learning tools.

resources: Access to Digital Archives of Historical Nursing Documents

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
